Text: Thanks! This was the best episode of the series :D

I have a 42" LCD TV and it doesn't look good to me on it. I don't think most people should expect to like how my 272p videos look on such a large display. LOL

A micro sized encode shouldn't be judged on playing it any more than twice the size of the native resolution of the file. :)
